title: What is Cart-to-Table™?
desc: Cart-to-Table™ is Pantri App’s AI-powered home dining experience. Customers can search thousands of recipes, create personalized meal plans, auto-populate their grocery list, and send it directly to Instacart for delivery. In Houston, customers can also book a vetted personal chef to cook meals in their home.

title: Do I need to download an app?
desc: No. You can access Cart-to-Table™ through the Pantri web app during early access. A mobile app launches in 2026.

title: Where is Cart-to-Table™ available?
desc: The digital Cart-to-Table™ experience is available nationwide. Our chef services are currently available in Houston, Texas, with more cities coming soon.
